panels.visual: Wide establishing shot of the Silver Tower's ruined interior - broken staircases leading nowhere, floating platforms, impossible geometry. Cold silver light filters through cracks in reality. Bone collections line shelves. The party stands small against the vast, wrong architecture.
Armando gestures theatrically as he explains the mission, crimson coat dramatic against the silver surroundings. His showman's smile doesn't quite hide his unease.
panels.dialogue: Armando: "The Wizard Council hired us to retrieve the Staff of Silneas. You - or rather, 'Him' - agreed to help before... whatever happened to you."

panels.visual: Close on Eurostras's face, haunted eyes staring at his hands. One hand bears the Ring of Truth, the other holds a scrap of paper - his only way to communicate with the entity 'Him' that shares his body.
panels.dialogue: Eurostras: "A nameless monk in my body... and I remember nothing."
